infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: TaskMelt uses the microphone to convert your voice into tasks. For example, you can say 'Buy groceries tomorrow at 5pm' to quickly create a task without typing.
infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: TaskMelt accesses your calendar to sync tasks with your schedule and help you plan your day effectively.
infoPlist.NSRemindersUsageDescription: TaskMelt accesses your reminders to import existing items and keep everything in one place.
